<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Seasoned](/Feats.aspx?ID=2149) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 209 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Alcohol Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8), Trained in [Cooking Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8), or Trained in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)

</column>

---

You've mastered the preparation of many types of food and drink. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to checks to [Craft](/Actions.aspx?ID=43) food and drink, including [potions](/equipment/consumables/potions). If you are a master in one of the prerequisite skills, this bonus increases to +2.
